common.connection_problem:
Unable to connect to Plutus API :(
If your internet connection is working the Plutus API may be down temporarily.

support.username_copied: Your generated username has been copied to the clipboard. Please paste this username into any support requests involving your account.

app.create_account_message: Your Wallet Key has been copied to the clipboard, please save it in a safe place so you can recover your account if needed.
app.import_pk_success:
Wallet Key imported successfully!
Welcome to Plutus :)
app.detach_message: This will remove your Wallet Key from your secure storage permanently. Your account will not be deleted. To use this account on another device you will need to import the Wallet Key on that device.
app.detach_confirm_have: Yes, I have my Wallet Key saved already.
app.detach_confirm_copy: Yes, but copy my Wallet Key to the clipboard so I can save it now.
app.detach_confirm_cancel: No, I don't want to remove my Wallet Key.

first_use.welcome: Welcome to the Plutus mobile app!
first_use.msg_create: If this is your first time using this app, use the Create Account button below!
first_use.msg_import: If you already have a Wallet Key for an account and you want to use it on this device, use the Import Wallet Key option!
first_use.pk_clipboard: Copy your wallet private key to the clipboard
first_use.pk_paste: Tap paste button to enter and validate clipboard
first_use.pk_go: Key looks valid, tap arrow button to open account
